CustomField.formula: IF (ISNULL(Contract_Received__c ), null, IF (ISNULL(Hold_Needs_Approval__c ), null, Hold_Needs_Approval__c - Contract_Received__c))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the Hold: Needs Approval field is blank, the duration will be blank. If the Hold: Needs Approval field is complete, the duration is calculated by the Hold: Needs Approval minus the Contract Received date.
CustomField.label: Pending Hold: Needs Approval (Duration)
